description.name: Auto Release
description.tagline: Used for triggering automation without a remote API.
description.long:
This module can be used to trigger hooks and other automation when no module exists for the product.

This module supports the following actions at provisioning time:

* Create a To-Do item for manual follow-up
* Generate a Support Ticket
* Perform no automated actions

In all cases, in addition to the itemised action, it will allow other automation hooks to execute.
